title: Jakten på Berserk
overview: In Jakten på Berserk, Jarle Andhøy and his crew return to the Southern Ocean to try to find answers to what happened when Berserk disappeared. What made three experienced sailors sail into a predicted storm? Jarle Andhøy returns to Antarctica, where his ship Berserk and the crew of three disappeared in February 2011. Jarle and Samuel Massie were on the mainland when the boat unexpectedly left its safe haven, then sailed straight into a predicted storm.
